intro_text: Ok, now do not puzzle over it
after_text: Great job Newton! Let's go ahead

intro_text: Hey, Walter White, don't mess up with the game
after_text: The lab has not exploded! You can proceed to the next stop

intro_text: It's time to do some work...literally
after_text: Einstein would be proud of you! Now move on

intro_text: Let's see the nature of this problem...
after_text: It's time to get back to the wilderness and keep moving on

intro_text: Geeky enough to win? We will see...
after_text: Code Master, it's time to head to the next place

intro_text: I hope you don't need some drugs to pass this phase
after_text: Brilliant! Now let's run to the next place

intro_text: If you feel sick wait for the next game...
after_text: Great work! Let's go to the next building

intro_text: Do not feel traumatised by this, it is going to get worse
after_text: Now that you have survived, we must proceed to the next destination

intro_text: Have you ever been taught about hang yourself?
after_text: Your neck looks still OK. No excuse to spend more time here

intro_text: Want to become rich? Solve this first...
after_text: Excellent! Let's rush to the next location

intro_text: Hey Tony Stark, Jarvis is not here to help you...
Are you an assiduous reader? We will find that out...
after_text: Great progress! One less step towards the goal

intro_text: You arrive to the lake, but a giant DUCK monster spawns in front of you. Guess its name before it's too late!
after_text: You DUCK in the last moment avoiding the monster attack. Afterwards it vanishes in the pond. Good job!
